assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7NKFFKQ8 பெரிய அம்மையை உருவாக்கும் நோய்க்காரணி எது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

பெரிய அம்மையை உருவாக்கும் நோய்க்காரணி எது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

பேசில்லஸ் ஆந்தராக்ஸிஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2151"},{"text":"

வேரிசெல்லா வைரஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2152"},{"text":"

வேக்சீனியா வைரஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2162"},{"text":"

டிரிப்போனிமா பெல்லிடம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2167"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7NKFFKQ8 பெரிய அம்மையை உருவாக்கும் நோய்க்காரணி எது?","title":"7NKFFKQ8 பெரிய அம்மையை உருவாக்கும் நோய்க்காரணி எது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
